body: After seeing that shit if I was that kid... I would have killed my own fucking parents...if not killed I would've left the house,it would be hell living with the but  those two bastard father and son would've long died... I wasn't expecting this shit in the last chapter, husband is a cuckold lol.. he really don't deserve his wife... In short, that is not a family anymore.

So Kids What Did we learn from this Hentai 
That the husband is a fucking idiot who accepted that his wife is a slave to all the guys
And he should become a cuckold 
Wow real mature what an idiot

That ain't no happy ending. The husband accepted that she is the guys sex slave. The son found out and accepted as well since its the only way they can still be with her. Good old ntr, some evil shit. Just throw the bitch away man and move on. That's not love anymore.

@Berkel it’s still a manga, it’s just translated in Chinese and it usually did get updated every month and the most recent chapters (24-26 I believe) just got released/uploaded a while back like April or may I believe
closure? good/bad? dunno, but at least this series ended.

I don't get it why when author need to do many chapters, why not just release it even every month or 2? Look at all that  adult manhwa webtoons. Mostly have good story with sex scenes and can be long. Why hentai/doujins manga is not like that ? That's why i really like manhwa.

Wow is this really "the end" ? I don't understand this, but it looks like happy ending. I don't care that much, but i remember that manga from few years ago when i first time saw it in english and from what i checked, he made that manga for over 6 years lol. 6 years for 26 chapters?! Hentai/doujins industry is really slow... Even adult manhwa that people name pornhwa is a lot faster and many have weekly release.
